
# ICEPAY 
![icepay](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/icepay/logo.png?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `icepay` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] ICEPAY 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  ICEPAY has been active in the payment market since 1999. Our goal is to simplify payment processing to help reduce lead-time and increase conversion. Quick and seamless integration of products, applications and services is made possible through a variety of plug ‘n play webshop modules or our advanced Developer API.  We comply with the strictest of market standards and constantly try to exceed them.  As a payment institution, ICEPAY is authorized by De Nederlandsche Bank under European regulation of the Payment Services Directive (PSD), and can be found in De Nederlandsche Bank’s public registry.  We strive for technical excellence and operational integrity in all aspects of our business.
